IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE NEED-BASED SCHOLARSHIPS TO STUDENTS IN SCHOOLS IN THE FALL RIVER DIOCESE
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ASSURE THAT NO CHILD IS DEPRIVED OF THE OPPORTUNITY TO ATTEND ONE OF THE CATHOLIC SCHOOLS SPONSORED BY THE DIOCESE OF FALL RIVER DUE TO FINANCIAL HARDSHIP BY PROVIDING NEED-BASED SCHOLARSHIPS TO ENROLLED STUDENTS.
IRS990.Desc: FUNDS EXPENDED SO AS TO BENEFIT STUDENTS OF DIOCESE OF FALL RIVER'S PAROCHIAL SCHOOLS.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MOST REV EDGAR M DA CUNHA

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: MOST REV EDGAR M DA CUNHA SDV

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART III, LINE 12, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EARNINGS OF THE ENDOWMENT ARE TO BE USED TO PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS WITHIN THE TERMS DESIGNATED BY THE DONOR.

THE ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZES THE TAX BENEFIT FROM ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITION ONLY IF IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE TAX POSITION. ANY TAX BENEFITS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FROM SUCH A POSITION ARE MEASURED BASED ON THE LARGEST BENEFIT THAT HAS A GREATER THAN 50% LIKELIHOOD OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE RESOLUTION. MANAGEMENT HAS ANALYZED THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX POSITIONS, AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT NO LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS SHOULD BE RECORDED RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ON RETURNS FILED FOR OPEN YEARS (FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2020 THROUGH JUNE 30,2022) OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX RETURNS FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023. THE ORGANIZATION IDENTIFIES ITS MAJOR TAX JURISDICTIONS AS U.S. FEDERAL AND THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS; HOWEVER, THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT AWARE OF ANY TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH IT IS REASONABLY POSSIBLE THAT THE TOTAL AMOUNTS OF UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS WILL CHANGE MATERIALLY IN THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO FOLLOWS THE POLICY TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND PENALTIES RELATED TO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS (IF ANY) IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE. NO SUCH INTEREST AND PENALTIES HAVE BEEN RECORDED AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022.
DIRECT FUND EXP APPLIED TO GROSS RECEIPTS INCL DONATED AUCT ITEMS OF $1,400 70,427.
DIRECT FUND EXP APPLIED TO GROSS RECEIPTS INCL DONATED AUCT ITEMS OF $1,400 70,427.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ROMAN CATHOLIC BISHOP OF FALL RIVER

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOR THE FINANCIAL AID/SCHOLARSHIP GRANTS, THE ORGANIZATION DETERMINES THE STUDENTS' ELIGIBILITY PRIOR TO RELEASING THE FINANCIAL AID. SUBSEQUENTLY THE ORGANIZATION INFORMS THE PARTICIPATING ENTITY TO MONITOR THE STUDENTS' ENROLLMENT STATUS AND SATISFACTORY ACADEMIC PROGRESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS A WRITTEN CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY THAT APPLIES TO OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, TRUSTEES, KEY EMPLOYEES AND TO ALL EMPLOYEES WHO CAN INFLUENCE THE ACTIONS OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE RETURNS ARE AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION BY THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST, THROUGH THE GUIDESTAR WEBSITE AND THE MASSACHUSETTS ATTORNEY GENERAL'S WEBSITE.
